author: Jessica Donati
title: Tillerson, in Emotional Farewell, Praises U.S. Diplomatic Ranks
text:
WASHINGTON—Outgoing Secretary of State Rex Tillerson took deep breaths and appeared emotional as he delivered farewell remarks Tuesday only hours after being fired by President Donald Trump.
Mr. Tillerson, who didn’t mention Mr. Trump by name, thanked colleagues for their service during his 14-month tenure and said he would ask his team to remain at their posts to continue their mission.
